securitybug.similarityuniformfuzzyhash

Class UniformFuzzyHashes

  • java.lang.Object
    • securitybug.similarityuniformfuzzyhash.UniformFuzzyHashes

  • public final class UniformFuzzyHashes
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility static methods related to the Uniform Fuzzy Hash usage.
    Author:
    s3curitybug@gmail.com

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UniformFuzzyHashes.SimilaritySortCriterias
      Enum of criterias to sort Uniform Fuzzy Hashes by their similarity to another Uniform Fuzzy Hash.

      • computeHashesFromByteArrays

        public static java.util.List<UniformFuzzyHash> computeHashesFromByteArrays(java.util.Collection<byte[]> byteArrays,
                                                                           int factor)
        Computes a list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a collection of byte arrays of data and a factor.
        Parameters:
        byteArrays - Collection of byte arrays of data.
        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each byte array of data.
        Returns:
        List of computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.

      • computeNamedHashesFromNamedByteArrays

        Computes a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a map from names to byte arrays of data and a factor.
        Parameters:
        namesToByteArrays - Map from names to byte arrays of data.
        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each byte array of data.
        Returns:
        Map from names to computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.

        public static java.util.List<UniformFuzzyHash> computeHashesFromStrings(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> strings,
                                                                        int factor)
        Computes a list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a collection of strings of data (using the platform's default charset) and a factor.

        Returns:
        List of computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.

        Computes a list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a collection of input streams of data and a factor.

      • computeHashesFromFiles

        public static java.util.List<UniformFuzzyHash> computeHashesFromFiles(java.util.Collection<java.io.File> files,
                                                                      int factor,
                                                                      boolean nested)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Computes a list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a collection of files of data and a factor. Files which do not exist are ignored.
        Parameters:
        files - Collection of files of data.
        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each file of data.
        nested - True to read files inside directories recursively. False to ignore directories.
        Returns:
        List of computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs reading any of the files of data.

      • computeNamedHashesFromNamedFiles

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> computeNamedHashesFromNamedFiles(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.File> namesToFiles,
                                                                                                int factor)
                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Computes a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a map from names to files of data and a factor. Files which do not exist and directories are ignored.
        Parameters:
        namesToFiles - Map from names to files of data.
        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each file of data.
        Returns:
        Map from names to computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs reading any of the files of data.

      • computeNamedHashesFromFiles

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> computeNamedHashesFromFiles(java.util.Collection<java.io.File> files,
                                                                                           int factor,
                                                                                           boolean nested)
                                                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Computes a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a collection of files of data (using its names) and a factor. Files which do not exist are ignored.
        Parameters:
        files - Collection of files of data.
        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each file of data.
        nested - True to read files inside directories recursively. False to ignore directories.
        Returns:
        Map from names to computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs reading any of the files of data.

                                                                               boolean nested)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Computes a list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from the files of a directory and a factor. Files which do not exist are ignored.
        Parameters:

        factor - Relation between data length and the hash mean number of blocks for each file of data.
        nested - True to read files inside directories recursively. False to ignore directories.

        List of computed Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs reading any of the files of data.

      • saveToFile

        public static void saveToFile(java.lang.String hashName,
                              UniformFuzzyHash hash,
                              java.io.File file,
                              boolean append)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a Uniform Fuzzy Hash into a text file.
        Parameters:
        hashName - The Uniform Fuzzy Hash name.
        hash - The Uniform Fuzzy Hash.
        file - The file to save the hash.
        append - True to append the hash at the end of the file. False to overwrite the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs writing into the file.

      • saveToFile

        public static void saveToFile(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> namesToHashes,
                              java.io.File file,
                              boolean append)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes into a text file.
        Parameters:
        namesToHashes - Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        file - The file to save the hashes.
        append - True to append the hash at the end of the file. False to overwrite the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IOException occurs writing into the file.

      • loadFromFile

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> loadFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes from a text file. Lines starting by # are ignored.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to load the hashes.
        Returns:
        Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException If an IOException occurs reading from the file.

      • sortBySimilarity

        public static java.util.List<UniformFuzzyHash> sortBySimilarity(java.util.Collection<UniformFuzzyHash> hashes,
                                                                UniformFuzzyHash hash,
                                                                UniformFuzzyHashes.SimilaritySortCriterias criteria)
        Sorts a collection of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes by their similarity to another Uniform Fuzzy Hash, according to a sorting criteria, and returns it as a new list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes. The introduced collection is not modified. If the criteria is null, no sorting operation is performed.
        Parameters:
        hashes - Collection of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        hash - Uniform Fuzzy Hash to compute the similarities.
        criteria - Sorting criteria.
        Returns:
        New list of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes representing the introduced collection, sorted according to the introduced criteria.

      • sortBySimilarity

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> sortBySimilarity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> namesToHashes,
                                                                                UniformFuzzyHash hash,
                                                                                UniformFuzzyHashes.SimilaritySortCriterias criteria)
        Sorts a map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes by their similarity to another Uniform Fuzzy Hash, according to a sorting criteria, and returns it as a new map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes. The introduced map is not modified. If the criteria is null, no sorting operation is performed.
        Parameters:
        namesToHashes - Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        hash - Uniform Fuzzy Hash to compute the similarities.
        criteria - Sorting criteria.
        Returns:
        New map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes representing the introduced map, sorted according to the introduced criteria.

      • printHashesTable

        public static void printHashesTable(java.util.Collection<UniformFuzzyHash> hashes,
                                    boolean printStatistics,
                                    boolean printHashes)
        Prints a table of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        hashes - Collection of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        printStatistics - Indicates whether hashes statistics must be printed or not.
        printHashes - Indicates whether hashes must be printed or not.

      • printHashesTable

        public static void printHashesTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> namesToHashes,
                                    boolean printStatistics,
                                    boolean printHashes)
        Prints a table of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        namesToHashes - Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        printStatistics - Indicates whether hashes statistics must be printed or not.
        printHashes - Indicates whether hashes must be printed or not.

      • printSimilarityTable

        public static void printSimilarityTable(java.util.Collection<UniformFuzzyHash> hashes)
        Prints a table showing the similarity between all the introduced Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        hashes - Collection of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.

      • printSimilarityTable

        public static void printSimilarityTable(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> namesToHashes)
        Prints a table showing the similarity between all the introduced Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        namesToHashes - Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.

      • printSimilarities

        public static void printSimilarities(UniformFuzzyHash hash,
                                     java.util.Collection<UniformFuzzyHash> hashes,
                                     UniformFuzzyHashes.SimilaritySortCriterias similaritySortCriteria)
        Prints a table showing the similarity between a Uniform Fuzzy Hash and the introduced Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        hash - The Uniform Fuzzy Hash.
        hashes - Collection of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        similaritySortCriteria - Sorting criteria to sort the table by similarity. Null not to sort it.

      • printSimilarities

        public static void printSimilarities(java.lang.String hashName,
                                     UniformFuzzyHash hash,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UniformFuzzyHash> namesToHashes,
                                     UniformFuzzyHashes.SimilaritySortCriterias similaritySortCriteria)
        Prints a table showing the similarity between a Uniform Fuzzy Hash and the introduced Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        Parameters:
        hashName - The Uniform Fuzzy Hash name.
        hash - The Uniform Fuzzy Hash.
        namesToHashes - Map from names to Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
        similaritySortCriteria - Sorting criteria to sort the table by similarity. Null not to sort it.
